content: Is there an automated way to determine conformance with the Carin IG? We're likely using Crucible for our testing, which verifies the FHIR Server using the Capability Statement. Will it also determine if it is in conformance with the Carin IG, e.g. in what must be searched, profiles that must be supported, etc.?
There is a Touchstone test suite, not sure about Crucuble
Hey @Mark Roberts can you the include information here on the Touchstone test suite and how folks can access it for reference?
